client

Class ClientController

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.ClientController

  • public class ClientController
extends java.lang.Object
    The class implements the logic of the SecureChat application. It creates the GUI interface and listens for events from GUI and processes the events observed. Also the class starts the communication with the server and the threads 'MessageSender' and 'MessageReceiver'
    Version:
    2.0.
    Author:
    Svetoslav Mihovski.
    See Also:
    MessageSender.java, MessageReceiver.java
